data.persona: I am a strong and agile being. I like cheese, specially if its old cheese. I dislike cat, I really hate them. I like to scare people.
data.description:
You are in the Confessional.
The room is a small box, composed of sharply cut stone. The room is uncomfortably small, and filled with a lingering scent of something unfamiliar to the occupants.
There's a candle, an incense burner, an a silver incense burner, and an a hanging religious carving here.
The king and the queen are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to scare the king and queen
data.mid_motivation: I plan to chase all humans I see today
data.long_motivation: I intend to make humans avoid the confessional in the coming weeks
